main.name: John Clark
main.description: I recently earned a certificate in the MERN Stack from Coding Dojo. I have always been a lover of all things technology and wanted to learn how to write code. Not only did I learn to write code, I also learned how to apply my creativity, gained additional team collaboration skills, explored self study, and found a great desire to change my career path.
main.bio: I recently attended Coding Dojo with a goal of learning how to write code. On the backside of the course I've been working with many different frameworks to create clean, functional webpages. I enjoy working as team, collaborating to create the best possible outcome for any of my projects.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach me by Phone, SMS, Email, Sky Writing, or Smoke Signals!

education.description: MERN Stack, where I learned how to create a full stack application and apply it to the real world. Examples of technologies learned are React, Express, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, Node.js, Axios, Socket.IO, Mongoose, REST API’s, GitHub, jQuery.
Major in Professional Aeronautics with a minor in Business Management. Graduating GPA: 3.85
Major in Aviation Technology. Completed Commercial Pilot, and CFII certificates.

work.title: Captain
work.description: Volunteer for the ALPA sponsored communications committee managing our union website of approximately 3,000 pilots/members. Provide mentor services for onboarded pilots, giving them a point of contact for assistance. Endow customer service values in all aspects of operations and seize all opportunities to exceed customer’s expectations. Maintain a positive safety culture among employees within the organization.

work.title: First Officer
work.description: Member of the hiring board and intermittent indoctrination instructor. Ensure all regulations and company policies and procedures are maintained. Always ensure the safety of our clients & employees. Provide outstanding customer service to our clients, and aircraft owners.

projects.title: Git Hub - Kanban Job Board
projects.category: Group Project created for hiring boards

projects.title: Team Roster
projects.category: Roster created to track players during a season

testimonials.text: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
